XRDDEV-1190 Fix error code 500 when REST endpoint is updated

- Return error code 409 with metadata when updating endpoint fails because of another endpoint with the same signature already exists.
- Catch DataIntegrityViolationException on controller layer because the exception is thrown when the transaction commits and therefore, it must be catched outside of the transaction's scope.
XRDDEV-1190 Remove a duplicate, unsused file
XRDDEV-1190 Return status code 400 instead of 409
